Sentencas: Geothermal energy is a promising renewable energy source due to its abundant global reserves.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: However, most geothermal resources are of low grade, severely restricting their power generation capacity and efficiency.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: In this study, the geothermal organic Rankine cycle power generation system is combined with a solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine system to improve the overall power supply and heat utilization efficiency.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: The heat source and cycle temperature are upgraded using high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell waste gas, and the combined system's efficiency is further improved through cascade heat utilization.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: Electrochemical-thermodynamic models are developed for the proposed system, and energy-exergy analysis is carried out.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: The effects of fuel cell current density, operating temperature and geothermal grade on the combined system's performance are comprehensively analyzed.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: Compared to the standalone geothermal system, the energy efficiency and output power of the organic Rankine cycle increase by 8.11% and 7.95% respectively in the baseline case.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: Under the lowest geothermal temperature condition, the cycle output power is improved by 22.64%.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: The net power of the combined system can vary from 358 kW to 846 kW by adjusting the fuel cell current density from 1000 A
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance
Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: A m- 2, demonstrating a flexible power supply capability.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: The optimal solid oxide fuel cell operating temperature is 1023.15 K, resulting in the highest system overall energy efficiency of 14.85%.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance

Sentencas: The presented work provides essential guidelines for improving geothermal power generation performance and designing applicable combined systems.
Titulo: Enhancing geothermal ORC power generation with SOFC: A comprehensive parametric study on thermodynamic performance
